titles.title: To amend title 49, United States Code, to include truck combinations in the definition of automobile transporter for purposes of certain length limitations.
To amend title 49, United States Code, to include truck combinations in the definition of automobile transporter for purposes of certain length limitations.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Highways and Transit.

bill.summary: This bill revises the definition of "automobile transporter" to include truck tractors attached to trailers that are designed to transport assembled highway vehicles for purposes of certain length limitations.
